title: AppSync to DynamoDB with Cognito authorization
description: Perform a write and list operation from AWS AppSync to Amazon DynamoDB that is protected with an idenity pool and userpool from Amazon Cognito.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to use AWS AppSync to read and write to an Amazon DynamoDB table. The requests are protected with both Amazon Cognito userpools and identity pools. This pattern is leveraging the native integration between AppSync and DynamoDB to map the request and response.

With AppSync you can write a JavaScript function to contain your business logic. This function is contained within a pipeline resolver that associates the GraphQL schema with the datasource (DynamoDB in this case).
At a high-level, this pattern deploys one AppSync API, a Cognito Userpool and Identity pool, and a DynamoDB table.
